> Using his sense of smell, Tucson=
 follows his comrades scent and follows that down into the cave that was st=
ill in tact. He transforms into robot mode and cautiously makes his way dow=
n.

> " I'm inside Lord Elder.  I can smell him.  He's a bit of a ways do=
wn, but I know I will find him.   And I sense humans, their scent is all ar=
ound, yet I see no evidence of their presence.  But so help me Primus, if t=
hey have hurt him or any other innocent Maximal or creature, I will serve t=
hem their consequences.  And they will have to serve them for as long as th=
ey live."
> 
> He narrows his eyes.
> 
> " Perhaps if forced to defend what=
 they have tried to destroy, they will think twice about laying harm on any=
thing on this planet.  Their guilt may just get the better of them."
>
